safetyTips: We are offering a contactless kerbside delivery using our own staff, packed and delivered following Public Health England Guidance.
name: Walworth Garden
description: To help South London keep growing, we are offering a free contactless kerb-side delivery service of plants and gardening essentials to the local community whilst the garden is closed due to the COVID-19 restrictions. Delivering indoor and outdoor plants, food crops, herbs, pots, and peat-free, organic compost to SE1, SE5, SE11, SE15-17, SE22, SE24, SW2, SW4, SW8 & SW9. Minimum spend Â£25. We deliver ourselves, on Monday, Wednesday and Friday. All purchases support our community projects.
